name: Aliens Tower Defense
description:
Sometimes it's better to prevent something that might happen...

Welcome to this action game of Aliens Tower Defense! This is the place where no one gives in. Everyone fights to the end, like true Spartans. Your main mission is to guard the tower from enemies who have come to visit you from the other galaxy.

Upgrade your army with rockets and grenades to take on unforgiving enemy numbers.

Are you ready for the battle?

Game Features :
- The possibility of increasing fire rate and load speed
- Friend`s help
- The army full of aliens
